ShortDescription.Value: Automatically loads Japanese translation JSON files for other mods and extracts localization keys per mod.

Publish.LongDescription:
Mod Translation Loader & Extractor for Cities: Skylines 2.
This mod provides: - **Automatic JSON Translation Loading** — Place .json translation files in the Translations folder and they are auto-detected and loaded. - **Japanese Locale Injection** — Translations are injected into the game's localization system (ja-JP). - **Multi-Mod Support** — Load translations for multiple mods simultaneously. - **Per-Mod Key Extraction** — Automatically extract localization keys from installed mods, grouped by mod. - **Existing Translation Merge** — When extracting, existing translations are preserved and merged. - **In-Game Reload** — Reload translations from the in-game settings panel. - **Debug Logging** — View detailed logs of translation loading and extraction.
## How to Use
1. Press "Extract Translation Keys" in the mod settings to generate per-mod JSON templates. 2. Fill in the "translation" fields in the generated JSON files. 3. Press "Reload Translations" or restart the game to apply.
## Translation JSON Format
```json { "modId": "mod_Anarchy", "modName": "Anarchy", "version": "2026-02-20", "entries": { "Options.SECTION[Anarchy.Anarchy.AnarchyMod]": { "original": "Anarchy", "translation": "アナーキー" } } } ```
